DOC.criteria: Signed informed consent prior studymandated procedure ; Male female age ≥ 18 year ; Body mass index ( BMI ) : 18.5 ≤ BMI ( kg/m2 ) < 32.0 ; Insomnia disorder accord DSM5 criterion ; Insufficient sleep quantity evaluate accord selfreported history data collect sleep diary ; Insomnia Severity Index score great equal 15 ; Complete IDSIQ™ sleep diary questionnaire require . Any current history sleep disorder insomnia , lifetime history relate breathe disorder , periodic limb movement disorder , restless legs syndrome , circadian rhythm disorder , rapid eye movement behavior disorder , narcolepsy ; Selfreported usual daytime nap ≥ 1 hour per day , ≥ 3 day per week ; Caffeine consumption ≥ 600 mg per day ; Shift work within 2 week prior screen visit , plan shift work V1 V3 ; Travel ≥ 3 time zone within 1 week prior screen visit , plan travel ≥ 3 time zone V1 V3 ; Known severe renal impairment know moderate severe hepatic impairment ; History clinical evidence disease medical condition treatment , may put subject risk participation study may interfere study assessment ; Any circumstance condition , , opinion investigator , may affect subject 's full participation study compliance protocol .
